description: > LOW CONFIDENCE! | > CORRECT NAME OF TOOL COULD ALSO BE 'PKIS', 'IBR' | Predicting kinase inhibitors using bioactivity matrix derived informer sets | This repository implements in Matlab the Regression Selection method described in "Zhang, Huikun, Lee, Ching-pei, Ericksen, Spencer S., Mason, Blake J., Wlodarchak, Nathan, Mitchell, Julie C., Wildman, Scott A., Wright, Stephen J., Nowak, Robert, Gitter, Anthony, Hoffman, F. Michael, and Newton, Michael A. Minimally-supervised, chemogenomic strategies for effective compound prioritization on kinases." | This repository implements two experiments described in the manuscript: | Training a single model for prediction on new kinases | Conducting leave-one-out cross-validation and outputing the final leave-one-out prediction on each input kinase
name: informer
